Blog.post: Today is a wendsday...so i have private lessons for my sax, so im PRETTY prepared...but not like 100% so i hope it all works out in the end. I beat another game today, like always, two days after getting it...OH WELL, it makes me an official nerd, but thats okay because i dont really care what you think!

Today was also boring, and we have nothing to eat...sadly...so im starving and im also hot haha. I just got back from shootin hoops so thats why, and its all rainy so the ball got wet and it picked up dirt and all so now my hands are like blackish. And also the basketball was comming at me after a long shot and it landed in a pudle and SPLASHED ME, so now im all wet and smelly, and my leg hurts from that gay passion vine i sliped on yesterday. Well now i think its time for me to go take a shower, so if you want you can come...

Today was okay...i just got finished watchin this comic named Ron White, and he is Freakin funny. So now im here...at my computer, and im really bored and its sad. Well today was really boring in the whole too!!! i wish i was friends with more people so i could go to movies and stuff with them, but IM NOT so oh well...

Alright...i just got back from church and it was great, but now im bored and i wish someone would speak up and SAY THEY WANT TO DO SOMETHING TODAY! but i doubt it will happen...im so bored and well...no one ever wants to do somehting with me...oh well i guess thats what you get for being pretty...

This is my second post...obviously and i would like to explain to you how bored i am...this is like the boredest time ive been in my life and i ALSO wanted to thank Alexis and Laura for going and helping me to pick out shirts...and expesially Laura for helpin me take of my belt...haha...well it was a really fun time and we've done it only one time since then...and i hope we can stay in touch and do it more...even though Alexis dosnt like me anymore...oh well theres more people out there...isnt there? Well its pretty late and i guess i should head to bed...but before i do i wanted to catch you up on the movie yesterday and how unbeleivibly uncomfortable it was...with me sitting alone...and peter and myka snuggled...and Zack and Christina...doin...uhh...yeah...it was very weird...and i didnt like it a bit...so i was alone...and bored...and a little sad because no one was there to lean on or talk to or snuggle with because it was FREAKIN cold in there...geeze...well i hope you liked this post and i hope we are still cool about everything...
Hey guys this is my first posting so...if you want you can read it and all and i hope you have a fun time today because im BORED...
